survey1.Question: Hello! I'm Tara from ERC.  I am reaching out to you to have a quick catch up on behalf of the ERC team. This is a regular communication exercise where we reach out to employees for their candid feedback on key processes. Can I ask you few questions?
alternateQ: Would you like to take the survey now ?

survey1.Question: At Adobe, discussion on goal setting, feedback and individual development happens through Check-in conversations between employees and their managers. Did you have a check-in recently?  Yes/ No
alternateQ: I meant - Did you and your manager discuss your goals, feedback and development plans recently? You can also get more details on check-in by clicking on this link(Check-in page in inside Adobe) (yes/No)

survey1.Question: What is the frequency at which you have Check-in with your manager? (Yearly/ Quarterly/ Monthly/ No set frequency)
alternateQ: What is the frequency at which you have Check-in with your manager? (  Yearly/ Quarterly/ Monthly/ No set frequency)

survey1.Question: Do you and your manager set ongoing expectations for your role?  Yes/ No
alternateQ: Do you and your manager set ongoing expectations for your role?  Yes/ No

survey1.Question: Do you have clarity on the performance measures/success metrics  for your role? Yes/ No
alternateQ: Do you have clarity on the performance measures/success metrics  for your role? Yes/ No

survey1.Question: Do you receive timely and constructive feedback.  Yes/ No
alternateQ: Do you receive timely and constructive feedback.  Yes/ No

survey1.Question: Do you  have a development plan in place ? Yes/ No
alternateQ: Do you  have a development plan in place ? Yes/ No

survey1.Question: Did you have a learning opportunity in last 12 months. Learning opportunities could mean shadowing, a new assignment or project on the job, attending a training, conference, session or taking a classroom or online course.  etc.? Yes/ No
alternateQ: Did you have a learning opportunity in last 12 months. Learning opportunities could mean shadowing, a new assignment or project on the job, attending a training, conference, session or taking a classroom or online course.  etc.? Yes/ No

survey1.Question: This is one of the various  mechanisms for our employees to give feedback and it would not take more than 30 minutes. survey1.Question:
At Adobe, employees and their managers have year around discussions on goal setting, feedback and individual development. These Check-in discussions mostly happen quarterly and the constructive conversation with ongoing feedback provides employees with an opportunity to drive performance throughout the year. These are different than regular 1-1's/status meetings you may be having with your managers. Please refer to the Check-in page on Inside Adobe(link - https://inside.corp.adobe.com/learning/check-in.html) to read more. Hope this clarification helps. 
 Did you have a check-in conversation with your manager recently?  (Yes or No)
alternateQ:
At Adobe, employees and their managers have year around discussions on goal setting, feedback and individual development. These Check-in discussions mostly happen quarterly and the constructive conversation with ongoing feedback provides employees with an opportunity to drive performance throughout the year. These are different than regular 1-1's/status meetings you may be having with your managers. Please refer to the Check-in page on Inside Adobe(link - https://inside.corp.adobe.com/learning/check-in.html) to read more. Hope this clarification helps. 
 Did you have a check-in conversation with your manager recently?  (Yes or No)

survey1.Question:
Having a development plan means that employees know how they are performing, they can plan actionable goals in terms of learning, career and experience. It is employee's responsibility to have these discussions, prepare a plan for themselves and discuss it with their manager.
